devdoc.details: Manages swapping between different underlying oracle provider interfaces over time.

returns.atVersion: The oracle version at the given timestamp

returns._0: The factory that created this instance

params.account: Original sender to optionally use for callbacks

update(address).details: Both the current and new oracle provider must have the same current

devdoc.title: Oracle

at(uint256).notice: Returns the oracle version at a given timestamp

factory().notice: Returns the factory that created this instance

global().notice: The global state of the oracle

oracles(uint256).notice: A historical mapping of underlying oracle providers

request(address).notice: Requests a new version at the current timestamp

status().notice: Returns the latest committed version as well as the current timestamp
